original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar took some valuable things from the Lord's temple. He took them to Babylon and he put them in his palace there.
korean_text: 느부갓네살이 또 여호와의 전 기구들을 바벨론으로 가져다가 바벨론에 있는 자기 신당에 두었더라

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar took some valuable things
and he put them in his palace there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에 있는 자신의 궁에 그것들을 두었다
